intro: Banadir Regional Administration (BRA) plays a vital role in strengthening governance and improving services for the people of Mogadishu. It works to enhance security, support development projects, and promote community well-being. Through its ongoing efforts, the administration continues to contribute positively to the city's growth, stability, and future progress
heading: The Citizen
subIntro: Every resident of the Banadir Region deserves fair, transparent, and dignified public services. BRA is committed to serving citizens with integrity, accountability, and respect.
items: Citizen-Centered Governance: BRA is committed to protecting the rights and interests of every resident in the region.
Transparent Services: All BRA services are delivered with clarity, openness, and accountability to the public.
Responsible Administration: Government offices under BRA must follow proper procedures and uphold ethical standards.
Rule of Law: Any misuse of authority, resources, or public trust is subject to legal action and administrative consequences.
